name: cumulocity-node-red
author: Tristan Bastian
description: Node-RED integration into Cumulocity. With the Node-RED instance running as a microservice inside of Cumulocity.

scripts.build:release: yarn build:docker && yarn workspace cumulocity-node-red-ui build:release
scripts.build:docker: docker build --platform linux/amd64 --target prod -t node-red-ms . && docker save node-red-ms -o image.tar && zip ./node-red cumulocity.json image.tar
